tns:Object.name: META
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE META (VERSION INT NOT NULL)

tns:Object.name: TABLESPACES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLESPACES ( SPACE_ID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, SPACE_NAME VARCHAR(128) BINARY NOT NULL UNIQUE, SPACE_HANDLER VARCHAR (1024) DEFAULT 'HDFS', SPACE_URI VARCHAR (4096) BINARY NOT NULL, UNIQUE INDEX IDX_NAME (SPACE_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: DATABASES_
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE DATABASES_ ( DB_ID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, DB_NAME VARCHAR(128) BINARY NOT NULL UNIQUE, SPACE_ID INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (SPACE_ID) REFERENCES TABLESPACES (SPACE_ID), UNIQUE INDEX IDX_NAME (DB_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: TABLES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE TABLES ( TID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, DB_ID INT NOT NULL, TABLE_NAME VARCHAR(128) BINARY NOT NULL, TABLE_TYPE VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, PATH VARCHAR(4096) BINARY, STORE_TYPE CHAR(16), FOREIGN KEY (DB_ID) REFERENCES DATABASES_ (DB_ID), INDEX IDX_DB_ID (DB_ID), UNIQUE INDEX IDX_TABLE_ID (DB_ID, TABLE_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: COLUMNS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE COLUMNS ( TID INT NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR(255) BINARY NOT NULL, ORDINAL_POSITION INT NOT NULL, NESTED_FIELD_NUM INT NOT NULL, DATA_TYPE CHAR(16), TYPE_LENGTH INTEGER, PRIMARY KEY (TID, ORDINAL_POSITION), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: OPTIONS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE OPTIONS ( TID INT NOT NULL, KEY_ VARCHAR(255) BINARY NOT NULL, VALUE_ VARCHAR(4000) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (TID, KEY_), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: INDEXES
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE INDEXES ( INDEX_ID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, DB_ID INT NOT NULL, TID INT NOT NULL, INDEX_NAME VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, INDEX_TYPE CHAR(32) BINARY NOT NULL, PATH VARCHAR(4096) NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAMES VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, -- array of column names DATA_TYPES VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, -- array of column types ORDERS VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, -- array of column orders NULL_ORDERS VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, -- array of null orderings IS_UNIQUE BOOLEAN NOT NULL, IS_CLUSTERED BOOLEAN NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (DB_ID) REFERENCES DATABASES_ (DB_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE INDEX IDX_DB_ID_NAME (DB_ID, INDEX_NAME) )

tns:Object.name: INDEXES_IDX_TID_COLUMN_NAME
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE INDEX INDEXES_IDX_TID_COLUMN_NAME on INDEXES (DB_ID, TID, COLUMN_NAMES)

tns:Object.name: STATS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE STATS ( TID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, NUM_ROWS BIGINT, NUM_BYTES BIGINT, FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITION_METHODS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITION_METHODS ( TID INT NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, PARTITION_TYPE VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, EXPRESSION VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, EXPRESSION_SCHEMA VARCHAR(1024) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITIONS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITIONS ( PARTITION_ID INT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, TID INT NOT NULL, PARTITION_NAME VARCHAR(255) BINARY, PATH VARCHAR(4096) BINARY, UNIQUE INDEX PARTITION_UNIQUE_IDX (TID, PARTITION_NAME), FOREIGN KEY (TID) REFERENCES TABLES (TID) ON DELETE CASCADE )

tns:Object.name: PARTITION_KEYS
tns:Object.tns:sql: CREATE TABLE PARTITION_KEYS ( PARTITION_ID INT NOT NULL, TID INT NOT NULL, COLUMN_NAME VARCHAR(255) BINARY NOT NULL, PARTITION_VALUE VARCHAR(255) BINARY, INDEX PARTITION_KEYS_IDX (TID, COLUMN_NAME, PARTITION_VALUE), FOREIGN KEY (PARTITION_ID) REFERENCES PARTITIONS (PARTITION_ID) ON DELETE CASCADE )
